--map.data: should be parsed as a map with a keyname containing only whitepsace

--comment mapWithLeadingSpaces: maps with leading spaces should not be parsed
--comment currentContextMapWithLeadingSp: current context maps with leading spaces should not be parsed
--comment: comments with leading spaces should NOT be removed
comments with leading spaces should NOT be removed
comments with trailing spaces should still be removed
--comment includeWithLeadingAndTrailingS: include path should have leading and trailing spaces trimmed
